properties.areaDesc: Orange; Seminole; Coastal Volusia; Inland Volusia
properties.headline: Red Flag Warning issued February 29 at 4:25AM EST until February 29 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Melbourne FL
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Melbourne has issued a Red Flag
Warning, which is in effect from noon today to 7 PM EST this
evening.

* AFFECTED AREA... Inland Volusia... Orange... Seminole...
Coastal Volusia.

* WIND...Northwest around 15 mph.

* HUMIDITY...Minimum relative humidity values between 25-30%

* IMPACTS...any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly.
Outdoor burning is not recommended.
properties.instruction:
A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions
are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of
strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can
contribute to extreme fire behavior.

NWSheadline: RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 7 PM EST THIS EVENING FOR LONG DURATION OF LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY AND WIND SPEEDS NEAR 15 MPH FOR VOLUSIA, SEMINOLE AND ORANGE COUNTIES
